trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_SEQ_00<tab>Lieutenant Edelstein wants you to report to the Flame General.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Cracked Fist at Camp Bluefog.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_SEQ_02<tab>Raubahn bids you rally the garrison at the Ceruleum Processing Plant as you did at Camp Bluefog. Make your way around the plant and /psych up the green recruits whose resolve appears to be failing.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_SEQ_03<tab>Your visceral gesticulations have helped the recruits steel themselves for the battle to come. Now go to Lieutenant Edelstein and /psych him up as you did the recruits.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_SEQ_04<tab>Lieutenant Edelstein admits that the fire of his resolve had grown dim, and thanks you for making it rage anew. With both the Bull of Ala Mhigo and your good self present, the entire garrison is fairly ablaze with determination.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Cracked Fist at Camp Bluefog.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Cracked Fist at Camp Bluefog.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_TODO_02<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Cracked Fist at Camp Bluefog.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_EDELSTEIN_000_000<tab>General Raubahn would no doubt be pleased to hear from you. You will find him over by the aetheryte.
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_RAUBAHN_000_010<tab>Ever a sight for sore eyes, my friend.
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_RAUBAHN_000_011<tab>I'm told you worked wonders on the morale of our garrison at Bluefog. I would have you do the same for the troops here.
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_RAUBAHN_000_012<tab>They put on a brave face when I'm about, but the fire in their hearts quivers as a candle in the wind. Aye, I can see it in their bearing.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_RAUBAHN_000_013<tab>About the camp, there are green recruits whose resolve falters. Find them, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and rekindle their fighting spirit the way only a hero can.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_RAUBAHN_000_014<tab>Once you have seen to the others, go and do the same for Edelstein. No matter what he may claim, the lieutenant would also be better for a bit of rousing. Trust me, I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_RAUBAHN_000_017<tab>About the camp, there are green recruits whose resolve falters. Find them, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and rekindle their fighting spirit the way only a hero can.
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC1_000_020<tab>Yes, sir... Right away, sir... <sigh>
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC1_000_025<tab>Uwaaaaaah! The Garleans are not near as frightening as you! I'd sooner face a vanguard while naked as my nameday!
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC1_000_030<tab>Er...thank you. I think. Whatever that was, it momentarily distracted me from my woes. <sigh>
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC2_000_040<tab>Ah, the oft-rumored hero... Doubtless you will single-handedly save us all...
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC2_000_045<tab>Your stirring gesticulation has reawakened me to my purpose! Hero or no, I will fight tooth and nail to protect the realm!
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC2_000_050<tab>I should be honored to meet a hero, but I just don't have the will to care...

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC3_000_060<tab>I<var 1F /var>I'm fine, t<var 1F /var>truly! N<var 1F /var>Nothing to w<var 1F /var>worry about! Just a m<var 1F /var>mild case of b<var 1F /var>battlefield nerves!
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC3_000_065<tab>YAAAAAARGH!!! I BREAK MY FAST ON GARLEANS! AND RIGHT NOW, I'M VERY <var 1A 02 /var>HUNGRY<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_ENPC3_000_070<tab><gasp> Th<var 1F /var>The hero of Cape Westwind! D<var 1F /var>Don't look at me! G<var 1F /var>Gods, <var 1A 02 /var>don't look at meeeeee<var 1A 01 /var>!

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_EDELSTEIN_000_080<tab>You would stoke <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> fighting spirit as you did our recruits'? Hah hah! A kind offer, but hardly necessary. I assure you, the fire in my heart rages as strongly as it ever has.

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_EDELSTEIN_000_085<tab>By Rhalgr... Without my realizing it, the fire of my resolve had grown dim. But thanks to you, it burns red-hot once more! If needs be, I shall lay down my life to secure victory for Eorzea!

TEXT_GAIUSC908_01043_EDELSTEIN_000_090<tab>Would that we had the time to get better acquainted, but right now we must focus on the operation. Should we fail, our lives─if indeed we still live─shall never be the same again.
